summary: THE SPEEDOMETER AND ODOMETER STARTED WORKING INTERMITTENTLY ABOUT ONE MONTH AGO.  THE DEALER SAYS THE SPEEDOMETER WILL HAVE TO BE REPLACED AT A COST OF APPROXIMATELY $330+ (PARTS AND LABOR).  THE VEHICLE IS ONLY 4 YEARS OLD WITH LESS THAN 60,000 MILES.  SEVERAL OTHER CONSUMERS SUBMITTED IDENTICAL COMPLAINTS.   *NLM
